Constants

Public Instance methods

display()

画面情報を Display クラスのインスタンスで返す。

[Source]

    # File lib/jpmobile/mobile/softbank.rb, line 44
44:     def display
45:       return @__display if @__display
46:       p_w = p_h = col_p = cols = nil
47:       if r = @request.env['HTTP_X_JPHONE_DISPLAY']
48:         p_w, p_h = r.split(/\*/,2).map {|x| x.to_i}
49:       end
50:       if r = @request.env['HTTP_X_JPHONE_COLOR']
51:         case r
52:         when /^C/
53:           col_p = true
54:         when /^G/
55:           col_p = false
56:         end
57:         if r =~ /^.(\d+)$/
58:           cols = $1.to_i
59:         end
60:       end
61:       @__display = Jpmobile::Display.new(p_w, p_h, nil, nil, col_p, cols)
62:     end

position()

位置情報があれば Position のインスタンスを返す。無ければ nil を返す。

[Source]

    # File lib/jpmobile/mobile/softbank.rb, line 29
29:     def position
30:       return @__position if defined? @__position
31:       if params["pos"] =~ /^([NS])(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+\.\d+)([WE])(\d+)\.(\d+)\.(\d+\.\d+)$/
32:         raise "Unsupported datum" if params["geo"] != "wgs84"
33:         l = Jpmobile::Position.new
34:         l.lat = ($1=="N" ? 1 : -1) * Jpmobile::Position.dms2deg($2,$3,$4)
35:         l.lon = ($5=="E" ? 1 : -1) * Jpmobile::Position.dms2deg($6,$7,$8)
36:         l.options = params.reject {|x,v| !["pos","geo","x-acr"].include?(x) }
37:         return @__position = l
38:       else
39:         return @__position = nil
40:       end
41:     end
serial_number()

製造番号を返す。無ければ nil を返す。

[Source]

    # File lib/jpmobile/mobile/softbank.rb, line 16
16:     def serial_number
17:       @request.env['HTTP_USER_AGENT'] =~ /SN(.+?) /
18:       return $1
19:     end
